Class Shop

public class Shop

Class that handles buy/sell of items.

Default Constructor. Loads the stock without infinite values. Starts with 0 Money.

Method Detail

buy

public void buy(User user,
                java.lang.String[] split)
Function ran when a player tries to buy an item. Parses the command used to get the item name as well as the amount. If no amount is given the default value is 1.

Parameters:
user -
split -

public void restock(boolean force)
Tries to restock the Shop. If not forced, checks the last restock time against the current Server time.

Parameters:

Normal restock call, not forced.

sell

public void sell(User user,
                 java.lang.String[] split)

public java.lang.String getSaveString()
Returns the save string to write to file. Format is ShopName:Shop Money:infAmount:lastRestock:idamount:id amount:id amount
